code: import React,{useEffect,useState}from"react";import CommonSection from"../shared/CommonSection";import TourCard from"../shared/TourCard";import{BASE_URL}from"../utils/config";import"../styles/wishlist.css";import{Row}from"reactstrap";import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";export default function Wishlist(){const[items,setItems]=useState([]);useEffect(()=>{const fetchWishlist=async()=>{const token=localStorage.getItem("token");if(!token)return;try{const res=await fetch("".concat(BASE_URL,"/wishlist"),{headers:{Authorization:"Bearer ".concat(token)}});const data=await res.json();setItems((data===null||data===void 0?void 0:data.tours)||[]);}catch(e){console.error("Error fetching wishlist:",e);}};fetchWishlist();},[]);return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("section",{className:"wish",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("h1",{align:"center",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("br",{}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("span",{className:"gradient-text",children:"Your Wishlists"})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("br",{}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"container",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"row",children:[items.length===0&&/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{className:"text-center mt-4",children:"No favorites yet."}),items.map(t=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"col-12 col-md-6 col-lg-3 col-md-6 mb-4",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(TourCard,{tour:t,wishlistIds:items.map(tt=>tt._id)})},t._id))]})})]});}
